pivot.charts.skin
Class ChartViewSkin

java.lang.Object
  pivot.wtk.skin.ComponentSkin
      pivot.charts.skin.ChartViewSkin
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChartView.Skin, ChartViewCategoryListener, ChartViewListener, ChartViewSeriesListener, ComponentKeyListener, ComponentLayoutListener, ComponentListener, ComponentMouseButtonListener, ComponentMouseListener, ComponentMouseWheelListener, ComponentStateListener, ConstrainedVisual, Skin, Visual
Direct Known Subclasses:
AreaChartViewSkin, BarChartViewSkin, HighLowChartViewSkin, LineChartViewSkin, PieChartViewSkin
public abstract class ChartViewSkin
extends ComponentSkin
implements ChartView.Skin, ChartViewListener, ChartViewCategoryListener, ChartViewSeriesListener

Abstract base class for chart view skins.

Author:
gbrown
